directions: In a large saucepan, combine celery, onions, red pepper, and shrimp.  Cook over medium heat until shrimp are pink.
Mix in canned vegetables and mushroom soup, soy sauce, and green pepper.
Heat thoroughly.  Serve over chow mein noodles.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
title: Shrimp Chinese Chow Mein
